replies.body: PLZZ MAKE MORE SKIN FOR KINDRED{{champion:203}}

i think swain needs more and the new yorick mori is dropping so yeah... let swain get a skin first, and who plays kindred anymore? Then again, swain hardly ever gets played either... I am one of the most common one tricks, Thresh.
I main kindred, she still gets played a bit, just nowhere near as much as she use too.
i play kindred there's a lot of people play kindred its just rare to see kindred these days doesn't mean they have to to stop making skins for them
Isn't (one of) the rework team(s) working on Swain? So aren't skins off the table for him until his rework is done?
i really want them to make a galaxy skin for them  inspired by auralion sol i mean they should do a galaxy theme and make skins for some champs that would be so coooll
Are they all normal? No lengendary, ultimate or whatever? Where can i find a list of skins per type, tier, whatever?
Only skins 1350 and below go on sale, and you can find a list of which ones will go on sale later by looking at the Month Sales Schedule, still these are some good skins imo {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Ultimate and legendary skins only go once on the Early Sales and then never again.
When will it be the 19th for riot? Like what time zone.
